review_title: Temple was so-so, but scenery was very good.
review_body: C1 ( 2013.11.09 ) The Sutasa temple was so-so than another many temple, but scenery with temple and mountain was very beautiful. There was a tracking way, small lake, beautiful mountain with auntumn colors. and fresh air make me cool. Some of building was remodeling, but good place to walk with aumtumn atmosphere.
